meanings.definition: Of or relating to a polynomial equation of the fifth degree.
meanings.sent1: The quintic function had a steep curve.
meanings.sent2: She studied the quintic equation in her math class.
meanings.sent3: The quintic problem seemed to be playing hide and seek with the students.
meanings.sent4: The quintic nature of the problem made it challenging to solve.
meanings.sent5: The quintic shape of the graph resembled a mountain peak.

meanings.sent1: The mathematician solved the quintic with ease.
meanings.sent2: The quintic was the focus of the algebra exam.
meanings.sent3: The quintic sat quietly among the other equations.
meanings.sent4: The quintic stood out like a bright star in the math textbook.
meanings.sent5: The quintic demanded attention with its complexity.
